boardgame.description: A plastic tiki idol is placed in the raised middle of a molded, 3d board, where it can rotate freely. Players move their explorer pawns up the sides of the mountain along paths and through caves, trying to reach the top of the mountain, retrieve the idol's giant ruby, and take it down the other side to the waiting boat. However, both the idol and volcanic vents throughout the board periodically spit out _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;fireball_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; marbles, which physically roll down the mountain, either plowing through explorer pawns in their path, or toppling triggered bridges as they pass under them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: FIREBALL ISLAND made by Milton Bradley in 1986. Complete with all original parts including gameboard, idol, 4 adventurers, 5 red marbles, 4 tokens, red gem, 2 bridges with stands, die, 48 cards and rulebook. Game condition looks like it was played once or twice, then put away. Cards have no creases or tears and all pieces are unbroken. Box is beat up though complete. Shipping weight is 5 pounds.
This game was a preorder.
Complete with all original parts and in very good condition with a little wear to the box. Buyer agrees to pay $15 shipping in US. PayPal only.
great condition and complete. box is good condition, but definitely a little beat up. get this classic and hard to find game! buy from me now and i ship the next business day.

This game is mostly complete, but it is missing some of the marbles, and some of the gem holders. I think everything else is present, though the box has seen some wear. The game board itself is just fine, and all bridges and bridge parts are intact. All the cards are present, though they have seen wear. Shipping is calculated based on where you live. I can send it via Priority Mail if you live in the US. Feel free to ask questions!

Box has surface wear (not bad) and ALL game components are included in excellent condition. I inventoried all the parts against the listing in the instructions. Game board is Perfect. Insured Shipping is $10 to United States Only.
Game is complete. Box has a little wear, but the game components are all there and in good shape. This game is fun for the whole family and is tough to find in good condition.

Acceptable condition. Box is a bit crunched from having other games stored on top of it. Missing one card and one plastic token; these are not crucial components. Otherwise complete and in great shape. Seems almost unplayed. Buyer pays actual shipping costs. I package games very carefully to avoid damage in shipment.

This is really Fireball Island 1.25. As you can see in the photo - you get 2 boards, 2 tikis and 4 bridges. The cards are complete with some extras added in. The only missing piece is one black octagon which is honestly not very necessary to play the game. One board is slightly faded (just how it was printed), the other board is very colourful but both are in excellent condition. There is only one box which is in acceptable condition but certainly aged. I will ship everything in a solid cardboard box - well packaged.

Fireball Island. 100% complete (one marble has been replaced). Components in great shape, box a bit beat up. The game, while relatively light is very large. Just an FYI regarding shipping. I welcome international buyers!

Catch the fireball!!! The game is alot bigger that I thought it would be based on BGG pictures of it! The marbles rolling down the volcano taking out explorers is soemthing to behold and that idol is just cool. The 3D board looks as if it has never been used... No cracks, scratches, or blemishes - the graphics are like mint. All parts are included and in excellent condition except the original rulebook that has been replaced with a scanned printed copy. The box is fully intact with the only flaw being a slight puncture in the back and a little clear tape that once held the box shut for storage. I left the tape on to be removed by the owner if warranted. Shipping is $15.50 anywhere in the continental US. Please geekmail me with any questions regarding the game.

Please feel free to ask question(s) before buying the game. Game is complete and playable. Boards and game parts are in real good condition. Cards are in good condition with some minor wear. Box is in good condition with some minor ware. Game will be shipped from 98003 Item will be shipped cheapest way possible via US Postal with tracking added. (Unless you request faster shipping) If you want insurance add $1.35 to shipping Thanks
Overall in Very Good condition. Components in excellent condition. Box has some dents and tape was used to secure end flaps but is solid with no split corners or seams.
This was won in an auction and is for TheCheese
for sale to Andy W (dragontrainer) only.

Missing Blue token, 1 black hex piece. Has a replacement small bridge that works fine. Cards show wear. Box shows a lot of wear but it is complete. Shipping will be expensive. Minimum in the US will be $18.00.
Auction Item Reserved for user Cardboard Carnage

First the bad news: - Box has seen better days; some crushing damage on top, tape and markings present as well. Still holds the game and is structurally sound (if sagging) but definitely not something for a collector. - Original rulebook is missing and replaced with a printout. Now the good news: - Everything else is complete and in good/very good condition. (Cards show normal wear from use.) Additional photos available by request.
Auction win for Jubii2

This is the American Milton Bradley edition. The box shows shelf wear and is torn on the lower left corner. the cover art is clear and intact. The board is in excellent shape. The card deck is complete and in good shape. There are two pieces missing: one of the four hexagonal black tokens, and one of the five red marbles for which I have substituted an orange one. All other pieces in very good condition. Complete copy of the rules is included. I will provide an accurate shipping quote if you send me your zipcode. I do combine shipping for multiple items. Take $2 off total each additional game purchased from my marketplace at the same time.

Dutch version, though apart from the rules and easily translated cards the game is language independent. Fully complete, all components are accounted for. The box has some wear and tear and some damage to the corners, but is overall in quite good shape. Shipping: This box is HUGE, though not particularly heavy. I can wrap it in bubble wrap and brown paper and shipping costs would be €6,75 for Netherlands, between €8,50 and €11,05 (depending on country) for the rest of Europe, €17,10 for Russia and the rest of the world. If you want I can also try to hunt down an outer box big enough for this one, though that would likely put it above 2 kgs and substantially increase shipping costs (Europe: €25,00, Russia and rest of world: €34,30, Track _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Trace included). Within Europe payment by bank transfer is preferred.

This is the nicest version of this game I have ever seen offered for sale. It is 100% complete with the original pieces included. The cards are all smooth and flat, all the explorers are like new and the rule book is like new. The box is 100% clean with no tears, dings or dents. I count at most, 4 little scuffs from shelf wear, and the color is vivid. Even the open end of the box is clean.

Original 1986 vintage fireball island 3d board game made by Milton Bradley. Excellent condition. Cardboard box has no rips, just a slight dent in the length side(of the box). . Still has the toys _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;r us price tag on it . The playing board is like new . Rhis game comes complete and includes the original rule book, 1 red die, 48 player cards, 1 vul-kar idol, 5 red fireball marbles, 1 red jewel, 4 tokens, 2 bridges, 4 explorer player pieces. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve included an image of the game board, an image of the 48 cards, an image of the game pieces, and an image of the page in the rule book listing the type and number of game pieces that are included in the full game(for verification that I do indeed have them all, as seen in the other image)
Italian edition very good conditions, minor wear on box

The game box has wear. There is some dishing as well as wear to the artwork, and tape marks on the back. I would be happy to provide additional photos, or answer any questions The rulebook has some dog-ears. The game components are in great shape with minimal wear. The game is 100% complete. Will ship worldwide. Please send me you zip code, and I will provide a shipping estimate.
For Tobyjason from the the Fireball island Auction
Reserved for sparky123180 from geeklist auction. Local pickup; no shipping.

English version of Fireball Island. It is missing the orange hiker, one token, and the original rules (I have printed out a copy of the rules). All other pieces are present and in very good condition. Cards (all 48 of them) are overall in very good condition with only a few that have minor creases in one corner. Board has no cracks and is in really good condition but box has tear on one end flap and crushed in. Please see photos below and I will be happy to take more photos or provide more details if wanted. Please ask as I want you to be satisfied with your purchase. ***Postage could be rather expensive, which is why I am limiting this to US only. Local pick up is possible if interested. The packaged game will weigh about 5 pounds and is in a box sized 34 X 19.5 X 6.5 inches. I will ship from zip code 21702 and will print out postage on-line, if possible,to make it as cheap as possible. I will only charge the exact shipping costs. However, a cost estimate shipping across country via USPS was $35 to $45. I also checked into UPS and to send it across country would cost around $20 so that might be the preferred method. These are just examples and worse case scenarios since they are across the country. If you live closer to Maryland these should be cheaper. Send me a geekmail if you want me to figure out the postage cost or figure it out yourself from the mail website.
100% Complete Dutch Version (Vuurbal Eiland), including box. Some tape on the outside of the box.

Saved for user Polelle! ***New account users please see guidelines below. You must contact me with a valid email prior to confirmation of the sale*** ***Sorry, this sale is for continental U.S. due to the large box size*** Components 100% complete and in excellent shape. Explorers all complete and have not been glued back together. Cards in good shape with only minor wear but no obvious folds or tears. Original marbles and rules. Box has slight depression in one corner and wear on one edge (see pic). **Free shipping via Standard Post within Continental U.S. If you want Priority I can do that but costs could be an extra $50.00 depending upon your location. I live in Maryland and would only charge exact shipping but due to the oversize box the Priority shipping is expensive.**

Box in excellent condition for age, has one small cut (probably from when the case it was in was opened) and Toys R Us price sticker. 125% complete, I will include and extra board, idol, and marbles, and a ratty box from a yard sale copy. Almost 2 games. Cards sleeved. Will send photos on request! Please contact me with questions, payment via PayPal only. Shipping is $25 in the US due to size, or local pickup available

Very Good Condition. Open. Complete. Box is in really good condition for the age of the game. Some tape on the lid. Note: For buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s confidence, I have perfect positive feedback on eBay. Username: dlmann1 (281 transactions) All buyers pay actual shipping. Will ship worldwide.
This is it!! Fireball Island!! I have replaced the Blue Player mini and one Black Hex piece with perfect replicas, otherwise it is original. See Pictures!!
